prompts: Create a spooky ghost-type Pokemon with a dark, tattered appearance and glowing eyes.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a haunted doll, with creepy features and a mischievous grin.
Imagine a ghostly figure that floats silently, draped in shadows and emitting a chilling aura.
Show me a Pokemon that has a playful yet sinister personality, lurking in abandoned places.
Generate a Pokemon with a unique plush-like texture, contrasting dark colors with vivid accents.
Make a ghost-type Pokemon that appears to be made from old fabric with stitched features.
Give me a Pokemon that combines elements of a ghost and a marionette, with an eerie charm.

distinctive_features: Floating body with a sinister grin
